General.Name: RattanIndia Enterprises Limited
General.Description: RattanIndia Enterprises Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides manpower, human resource supply and consultancy, payroll management, and other related services in India. It is also involved in the real estate and renting; monetary intermediation; drone; and goods retail trade businesses. The company was formerly known as RattanIndia Infrastructure Limited and changed its name to RattanIndia Enterprises Limited in March 2021. RattanIndia Enterprises Limited was incorporated in 2010 and is based in New Delhi, India.

1.Name: Mr. Rajesh Kumar Arora B.A (Econ), PGDBA
1.Title: Company Sec. & Compliance Officer
